settings.restart_the_app_for_changes_to_take_effe: Restart the app for changes to take effect.
settings.are_you_sure_you_want_to_import_this_con: Are you sure you want to import this config?
settings.the_app_will_restart_to_load_the_new_con: The app will be restarted to load the new config.
settings.there_was_an_error_saving_the_config: There was an error saving the config.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose a color scheme for the interface.

window_opacity.label: Window Opacity
window_opacity.description: Adjust the window opacity. (This setting is ignored if 'None' is selected for window effect.)

use_system_title_bar.label: Use System Title Bar
use_system_title_bar.description: Use the default system title bar instead of a custom one.

log_levels.label: Log Levels
log_levels.description: Select the log levels to record.

max_log_files.label: Max Log Files
max_log_files.description: Set the maximum number of log files to retain.

import_export.label: Import/Export Settings
import_export.description: Import or export settings your settings from/to a JSON file.

save_window_status.label: Save Window Status
save_window_status.description: Save window size, position, and state.

update.failed_to_check_for_updates: Failed to check for updates. Please try again later.
update.failed_to_download_update: Failed to download update. Please try again later.
update.need_admin_privileges: Administration privileges are needed to update the application.

rcon_check_interval.label: RCON Check Interval
rcon_check_interval.description: Set the frequency (in seconds) for checking the connection and active players.

disable_weather_control_buttons.label: Disable Weather Control Buttons
disable_weather_control_buttons.description: Disables the weather control buttons at server management panel to prevent misclicks.

disable_random_event_buttons.label: Disable Random Event Buttons
disable_random_event_buttons.description: Disables the random event buttons at server management panel to prevent misclicks.

disable_other_management_buttons.label: Disable Other Management Buttons
disable_other_management_buttons.description: Disables the buttons in the 'Other' category of the server management panel to prevent clicks.

message.name: Send Message
message.description: Send a message to the server.

weather.title: Weather
weather.warning: Reported to cause problems with weather cycles

start_rain.name: Start Rain
start_rain.description: Starts rain with an optional intensity of 1-100

start_storm.name: Start Storm
start_storm.description: Starts a storm with an optional duration (in game hours)

random.title: Random Events
random.description: Triggers the clicked event on a random player

chopper.name: Chopper
chopper.tooltip: Place a helicopter event on a random player

gunshot.name: Gunshot
gunshot.tooltip: Place a gunshot event on a random player

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.tooltip: Trigger a lightning on a random player

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.tooltip: Trigger a thunder on a random player

check_mod_updates.name: Check Mod Updates
check_mod_updates.description: Checks whether a mod has been updated. Writes answer to log file and the chat.

alarm.name: Alarm
alarm.description: Sound a building alarm at the Admin's position. (Must be in a room)

setaccesslevel.title: Set Access Level
setaccesslevel.players: You will set access level for {{players}}.

observer: Toggle god mode and invisibility (self only)
Open locked doors and enter safehouses
Bypass lag kick and join full servers
gm: Toggle god mode, invisibility, and noclip (self and others)
Trigger alarms, gunshots, thunder, and choppers
admin: Reload server settings and Lua files

createhorde.title: Create Horde
createhorde.players: You will create a horde near {{players}}.

lightning.title: Trigger Lightning
lightning.players: You will trigger a lightning near {{players}}.

thunder.title: Trigger Thunder
thunder.players: You will trigger a thunder near {{players}}.

removeplayersfromwhitelist.title: Remove Player from Whitelist
removeplayersfromwhitelist.players: You will remove {{players}} from the whitelist.
removeplayersfromwhitelist.remove_from_players_list: Remove players from the player list too

add_missing_player.button: Missing a player? Add an offline player to the list.
add_missing_player.title: Add Player
add_missing_player.name: Name

connection.title: Connect To Your Server
connection.description: Enter your server details to connect

options.requires_2: Requires {{option1}} to be {{value1}} and {{option2}} to be {{value2}}.
options.requires_3: Requires {{option1}} to be {{value1}}, {{option2}} to be {{value2}} and {{option3}} to be {{value3}}.

DoLuaChecksum.description: If enabled, clients whose game files don't match the server's files will be kicked.

KickFastPlayers.description: If enabled, players that appear to be moving faster than possible will be kicked. May be buggy - use with caution.

SteamVAC.description: Enables the Steam VAC anti-cheat system.

BackupsCount.description: Specifies the number of backups to retain.

BackupsOnStart.description: Creates a backup when the server starts.

BackupsOnVersionChange.description: Creates a backup when the server version changes.

DiscordEnable.description: Allows global chat integration with a Discord channel using a valid bot token. Requires a valid bot token to be set under "Discord Token".

DiscordToken.description: Sets the bot token to access the Discord servers.

DiscordChannel.description: Sets the name of the Discord channel to integrate with. Use "Discord ID" if this does not work.

DiscordChannelID.description: Sets the ID of the Discord channel to integrate with. Use this if "Discord Channel" does not work.

FactionDaySurvivedToCreate.description: Specifies how many in-game days a player must survive to unlock faction creation.

FactionPlayersRequiredForTag.description: Number of players required in a faction to create a tag.

AllowDestructionBySledgehammer.description: Allows players to destroy world objects using sledgehammers.

BloodSplatLifespanDays.description: Number of days before old blood splats are removed. Removal happens when map chunks are loaded.

CarEngineAttractionModifier.description: Adjusts the range of zombie attraction to cars. Lower values can help lag.

ConstructionPreventsLootRespawn.description: Prevents loot respawn in buildings with player construction or barricades.

FastForwardMultiplier.description: Determines how fast time progresses during player sleep.

HidePlayersBehindYou.description: Automatically hides players out of view behind the character (like zombies).

HoursForLootRespawn.description: Number of in-game hours after which looted containers will respawn loot. Loot respawn is not impacted by visibility or subsequent looting.

ItemNumbersLimitPerContainer.description: Maximum number of items allowed per container. Includes individual small items like nails.

KnockedDownAllowed.description: Allows players to be knocked down.

MaxItemsForLootRespawn.description: Maximum number of items per container to allow loot respawn.

MinutesPerPage.description: Number of in-game minutes to read one book page.

PlayerBumpPlayer.description: Players can bump into and knock over each other.

PlayerRespawnWithOther.display_name: Enable Player Respawn At Other's Location
PlayerRespawnWithOther.description: Allows respawning at another player's location in splitscreen/remote play.

PlayerRespawnWithSelf.display_name: Enable Player Respawn At Death Coordinates
PlayerRespawnWithSelf.description: Allows respawning at coordinates where the player died.

RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval.display_name: Remove Player Corpses On Corpse Removal
RemovePlayerCorpsesOnCorpseRemoval.description: Removes player corpses from the ground when corpse cleanup triggers.

SledgehammerOnlyInSafehouse.description: Allows players to use sledgehammers only in their safehouses.

SleepAllowed.description: Allows players to sleep when tired but doesn't enforce it.

SleepNeeded.description: If enabled, players become tired and need to sleep.

SneakModeHideFromOtherPlayers.display_name: Hide From Other Players In Sneak Mode
SneakModeHideFromOtherPlayers.description: Hides players from others when sneaking.

SpeedLimit.description: Sets the maximum movement speed for players.

TrashDeleteAll.description: Allows players to use the 'delete all' button on bins.

AllowNonAsciiUsername.description: Allow use of non-ASCII (cyrillic etc) characters in usernames

AnnounceDeath.description: Broadcasts a global message in chat when a player dies.

BanKickGlobalSound.description: Plays a global sound when players are banned or kicked.

ClientActionLogs.description: Semicolon-separated list of actions that will be written to the ClientActionLogs.txt server log

ClientCommandFilter.description: Semicolon-separated list of commands that will not be written to the cmd.txt server log

DenyLoginOnOverloadedServer.description: Prevents login if the server is overloaded.

Map.description: Semi-colon separated list of maps to load on the server.

MapRemotePlayerVisibility.description: Controls the display of remote players on the in-game map

MaxPlayers.description: Maximum number of players allowed on the server (Excluding admins).

Mods.description: Semi-colon separated list of mod IDs.

Open.description: Allows players to join without being on the whitelist. Otherwise, admins must manually create username/password combinations.

PauseEmpty.description: Pauses game time when no players are online.

PerkLogs.description: Tracks changes in player perks in the PerkLog.txt file.

Public.description: Displays the server in the public server browser (Steam-enabled servers are always visible in the Steam server browser).

PublicDescription.description: Description shown in the server browser.

PublicName.description: Name of the server shown in the server browser and, if applicable, the Steam browser.

SaveWorldEveryMinutes.description: Interval between automatic world saves in real-time minutes (The map is usually saved only after clients leave a loaded area).

SpawnItems.description: List of items players spawn with.

SpawnPoint.description: Coordinates for player spawn points. See https://map.projectzomboid.com for coordinates.

UPnP.description: Allows automatic port forwarding on compatible routers.

WorkshopItems.description: Semi-colon separated list of workshop item IDs to install.

ServerWelcomeMessage.description: Message displayed to players upon login.

ResetID.description: Reset ID determines if the server has undergone a soft-reset. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. Used in conjunction with PlayerServerID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere

ServerPlayerID.description: ServerPlayerID determines if a character is from another server, or single player. This value may be changed by soft resets. If this number does match the client, the client must create a new character. This is used in conjunction with ResetID. It is strongly advised that you backup these IDs somewhere

PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction.display_name: Enable PvP Melee While Hit Reaction
PVPMeleeWhileHitReaction.description: Allows players to hit again when struck by another player.

SafetyCooldownTimer.description: Time before a player can re-enter PvP mode.

SafetySystem.description: Allows toggling PvP mode on and off on an individual basis. A player can only hurt another player when at least one of them is in PvP mode.

SafetyToggleTimer.description: Time required to toggle PvP mode.

ShowSafety.description: Displays a skull icon above the heads of players who have entered PvP mode

AutoCreateUserInWhiteList.description: Automatically adds new players to the whitelist (for open servers). Players will supply their own username/password on joining.

DropOffWhiteListAfterDeath.description: Removes players from the whitelist after death. This prevents players creating a new character after death on non-open servers.

LoginQueueConnectTimeout.description: Timeout duration for players in the login queue.

LoginQueueEnabled.description: Enables a queue for logging into the server.

MaxAccountsPerUser.description: Sets the limit on the number of different accounts a single Steam user may create on the server

MouseOverToSeeDisplayName.display_name: Require Mouse Over To See Display Name
MouseOverToSeeDisplayName.description: Requires players to mouse over someone to see their display name.

PingLimit.description: Sets a maximum ping before a player is kicked.

ShowFirstAndLastName.description: Shows first and last names above characters instead of usernames.

SteamScoreboard.description: Displays Steam usernames and avatars in the player list.

DisableSafehouseWhenPlayerConnected.description: Disables safehouse protections when a player is online, so that it acts like a normal house and is only secure when players are offline.

PlayerSafehouse.description: Allows players and admins to claim safehouses.

SafeHouseRemovalTime.description: Players are automatically removed from a safehouse they have not visited for this many real-world hours.

SafehouseAllowFire.description: Allows safehouses to be damaged by fire.

SafehouseAllowLoot.description: Allows non-members to loot items from safehouses.

SafehouseAllowNonResidential.description: Allows players to claim non-residential buildings (e.g., schools) as safehouses.

SafehouseAllowRespawn.description: Allows players to respawn in their safehouse after death.

SafehouseAllowTrepass.description: Allows non-members to enter a safehouse without being invited.

SafehouseDaySurvivedToClaim.description: Number of in-game days a player must survive before they can claim a safehouse.

ChatStreams.description: Enables specific chat streams for communication.

DisableRadioAdmin.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'admin' access level.

DisableRadioGM.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'gm' access level.

DisableRadioInvisible.description: Disables radio transmissions from invisible players.

DisableRadioModerator.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'moderator' access level.

DisableRadioOverseer.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with 'overseer' access level.

DisableRadioStaff.description: Disables radio transmissions from players with an access level.

GlobalChat.description: If enabled, players can communicate with everyone (using the /all command in chat).

VoiceMaxDistance.description: Specifies the maximum range for VOIP audio.

VoiceMinDistance.description: Specifies the minimum range for VOIP audio.
